pages.text: The $(l:3_system_malfunction/2_glitch_metal)Metal$() you created is quite versatile.$(br2)The first thing you can create with it is an $(item)Armor Set$() that gives you the power of flight (unless disabled in the config), and when your $(l:0_introduction/2_data_models)Models$() gain $(l:0_introduction/1_data)Data$() some $(l:1_machines/1_matter#pristine)Pristine Matter$() may be dropped.$(br2)These bonuses are disabled during $(l:2_trials/1_trials)Trials$().

Doubles the amount of $(l:0_introduction/1_data)Data$() gained, and when $(l:0_introduction/1_data)Data$() is gained there is also a chance that the $(item)Sword$() will get a $(item)Permanent Damage Increase$().$(br2)The $(item)Accumulated damage$() is not disabled during $(l:2_trials/1_trials)Trials$().
